diff_analysis.evidence: The new code only changes template names from .tpl.php to .twig, switches show() to send(), adds a header() call for X-XRDS-Location, and reindexes trustedSites by a hex key. No new direct output of unsanitized user input, SQL usage, CSRF-relevant state changes without existing protections, code generation, or file upload handling is introduced. The removed PHP templates contained the HTML rendering; their replacement Twig templates are not shown, so no new vulnerability can be attributed to the diff itself.
